instruction_welcome:
üëã *Welcome*! 

This bot allows you to track Road Police and other road events straight from this chat! 

Press next to fnd out how to work with it!
instruction_geo:
*Please, make sure Telegram has access to geo services* 

Service heavily relies on geoservces. We need you to gve Telegram access to your geopositon. With this we would be able to show events near you. 

No worries though, geopositon will only be used when you use the map application and only after you gave your consent!
instruction_map:
How about we check if there are any events nearby? 

Please, press 'üó∫Ô∏è *Open Map*' for this.
instruction_open_map:
Now you will be able to open map right in Telegram with no extra actions or authentication! Please, click 'üó∫ *Open Map*' on this new window! 

Press next to learn how to send pins directly from chat!
instruction_set_from_chat:
Choose event type bellow, for instance '*üöì Road Police*'. If you click '*üöì Road Police*' once again, you will send your current geolocation! 

That's all you need to know, :) 

Be careful on the roads!
instruction_skip: Agreed, who needs the instructions, easier to find out everything yourself!
help_geolocation:
1. Service won't work properly without Telegram having access to geolocation services. 

Please make sure it has the rights to use it 

 Here are useful links:
help_no_controls:
2. It might happen, that for some reason you don't see the controls. 
In this case, please, check right side of message input:
help_no_controls_end: Clicking the highlighted control should switch you from classic keyboard to button keyboard
help_send_event: 3. If you want to send an event from chat, please, choose event type bellow, for instance '*🚓 Road Police*'. If you click '*🚓 Road Police*' once again, you will send your current geolocation!
help_restart: 4. If you experience problems wth either application or the bot itself, please click or enter /start to reboot the bot for you.
pin_patrol_message: Please share your current geolocation with *🚓 Pin Patrol*, when passing near patrol or add concrete location as shown on the picture.
pin_speed_cam_message: Please share your current geolocation with *📸 Pin Speed Cam*, when passing near cam or add concrete location as shown on the picture.
pin_accident_message: Please share your current geolocation with *🚨 Pin Accident*, when passing near accident or add concrete location as shown on the picture.
pin_road_works_message: Please share your current geolocation with *🔧 Pin Road Works*, when passing near road works or add concrete location as shown on the picture.
fail_message: Oops, something went wrong, try again, please
error_message: Oops, something went wrong, try again, please
added_pin_message:
Thank you for contributing! 
You are a road *hero*! 🏅
